articles.author: Keith Pompey
articles.title: Allen Iverson has statue revealed at Sixers practice facility in Camden - The Philadelphia Inquirer
articles.description: Iverson's statue was the 10th installed on the Legends Walk. The Sixers will honor him during Sunday's regular-season finale against the Brooklyn Nets.
articles.content:
It was a statue reveal celebrated unlike no other at the 76ers practice facility.
